meanings.definition: A person who is very knowledgeable and enthusiastic about a particular subject or activity.
meanings.sent1: The afficionados of classic cars could identify any model at a glance.
meanings.sent2: Music afficionados enjoy attending live concerts to hear their favorite bands.
meanings.sent3: The afficionados of stamp collecting were so excited about the new rare stamp release.
meanings.sent4: She was an afficionados of astronomy, always eager to stargaze through her telescope.
meanings.sent5: The afficionados of gourmet cooking could taste the subtle differences in spices.

meanings.sent1: The afficionados gathered at the convention to share their love for the hobby.
meanings.sent2: The afficionados exchanged tips and tricks on how to improve their skills.
meanings.sent3: The afficionados proudly displayed their collections for all to see.
meanings.sent4: In the room full of afficionados, the energy and excitement were palpable.
meanings.sent5: The afficionados chatted animatedly about their shared passion for the activity.
